name: Footprints Festival

config_properties.name: Footprints Festival
config_properties.description: A curated discovery festival at TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, showcasing emerging international artists across diverse genres.

ai_profile:
**Footprints Festival 2026: A Celebration of Global Sounds**  

The Footprints Festival 2026 promises an eclectic mix of genres and cultures, showcasing 11 diverse artists from 10 countries. With Germany leading the lineup with four acts and contributions from countries like Nigeria, Brazil, Turkey, and Iran, the festival stands as a testament to the global nature of modern music. Genres span from Electronic and Psychedelic to Anatolian Rock, Malian Desert Blues, and Traditional Iranian music, offering audiences a rich tapestry of sounds that push boundaries and celebrate heritage.  

Diversity is at the heart of Footprints Festival. Seven out of the 11 artists identify as people of color, and the lineup features a mix of male, female, and mixed-gender groups, ensuring a wide range of voices and perspectives on stage. With no DJs on the roster, the focus is firmly on live performances and rich, authentic musical experiences, from Afrobeat rhythms to minimalist electropop and experimental jazz.  

With an impressive average rating of 7.73 and 100% of the acts rated by festivalgoers, the lineup is already generating excitement. Most artists received high praise, with eight of them rated between 8 and 9 out of 10. Additionally, all artists have a presence on Spotify, making it easy for attendees to explore their music before the event. Footprints Festival 2026 is set to be a vibrant celebration of musicâ€™s power to transcend borders, genres, and cultures.
